degree: Master’s Degree in Statistical Information Generation and Analysis
institution: National University of Tres de Febrero
detail: Graduate-level training in quantitative methods, statistical modeling, survey design, and public policy evaluation. Thesis in progress.
Five-year degree combining advanced coursework and research. Considered equivalent to a Master's degree in international academic systems.
